biotools.summary: Kalign is a fast and accurate multiple sequence alignment algorithm designed to align large numbers of protein sequences. Kalignvu is an xml based alignment viewer that allows users to resize alignments and choose different colour schemes. Mumsa is a tool for automatic assessment of alignment quality.

bioschemas.name: SBC tools
